name: Purrfect Apawcalypse: Infamous Furiend?!
storyline:
Volt and his friends came to visit Hanako-Land, one of the biggest theme parks in Kemono Town! But what's waiting for them there...monster balloons, blood demons, and a vicious terrorist?!

Can they escape from the hellish amusement park? And what is the terrorist's true purpose?!
summary: This is the PA series third Fan-game!
